author: emhane
content: here is an issue to address efficiency cost of DHT virtualisation overlays, which is a problem I have observed being ~~ targeted~~ created from several different angles since the past year: topic advertisement, portal network and DAS https://github.com/orgs/ethereum/projects/33/views/1?pane=issue&itemId=28612774

author: emhane
content: for you who don't know, more or less, topics-advertisement is about lookups of the same hashes frequently, portal network is about looking up random hashes and DAS networking also. all are using discv5, but all require different approaches to mitigate a node being DoSed from benevolent nodes as a side effect of the lookup.
